mapper.sql:
WHERE 1=1
AND a.TITLE LIKE CONCAT(CONCAT('%',#{keyword}),'%')
AND a.CONTENT LIKE CONCAT(CONCAT('%',#{keyword}),'%')
AND ( a.TITLE LIKE CONCAT(CONCAT('%',#{keyword}),'%') OR a.CONTENT LIKE CONCAT(CONCAT('%',#{keyword}),'%') OR a.SUBTITLE LIKE CONCAT(CONCAT('%',#{keyword}),'%') OR a.SUMMARY LIKE CONCAT(CONCAT('%',#{keyword}),'%') OR a.AUTHOR LIKE CONCAT(CONCAT('%',#{keyword}),'%') )

ORDER BY
a.SEQ a.TITLE a.SUBTITLE a.SUMMARY a.CONTENT a.AUTHOR a.REG_DATE
a.REG_DATE DESC, a.SEQ
ASC DESC DESC
mapper.select: SELECT a.SEQ AS "seq" , a.TITLE AS "title" , a.SUBTITLE AS "subtitle" , a.SUMMARY AS "summary" , a.CONTENT , a.AUTHOR AS "author" , DATE_FORMAT(a.REG_DATE, "%Y.%m.%d %H:%i:%s") AS "regDate" , a.REG_DATE AS "rawRegDate" FROM BOARD a

SELECT a.SEQ AS "seq" , a.TITLE AS "title" , a.SUBTITLE AS "subtitle" , a.TITLE AS "title" , a.SUMMARY AS "summary" , a.CONTENT , a.AUTHOR AS "author" , a.REG_DATE AS "regDate" , (SELECT SEQ FROM FILE WHERE CHANNEL = 'board' AND CATEGORY = 'mainImage' AND OWNER_SEQ = a.SEQ LIMIT 1) AS "mainImageSeq" , (SELECT CONCAT(PATH, '/', NAME) FROM FILE WHERE CHANNEL = 'board' AND CATEGORY = 'mainImage' AND OWNER_SEQ = a.SEQ LIMIT 1) AS "mainImage" FROM BOARD a WHERE a.SEQ = #{seq}
